docs.snippet: Fox’s chief executive, Rupert Murdoch, hopes to challenge ESPN for some of the lucrative revenue that the sports media giant has had largely to itself for more than three decades....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fox’s chief executive, Rupert Murdoch, hopes to challenge ESPN for some of the lucrative revenue that the sports media giant has had largely to itself for more than three decades.
docs.abstract: Fox intends to create all-sports network called Fox Sports 1; chief executive Ruper Murdoch hopes to challenge ESPN for some of the lucrative revenue that the sports media giant has monopolized for more than three decades.

headline.seo: Fox Planning National Sports Network It Hopes Can Challenge ESPN
headline.main: Seeing Riches in Sports TV, Fox Will Create New Network
headline.print_headline: Seeing Riches In Sports TV, Fox to Create New Network

byline.original: By RICHARD SANDOMIR and AMY CHOZICK

docs.snippet:
Warren E. Buffett  has found his bear.
   
In his annual letter to shareholders, published on Friday, Mr. Buffett said that he wanted to “spice things up” by finding a money manager with an unfavorable view of  Berkshire Hath...
docs.lead_paragraph:
Warren E. Buffett has found his bear.
 
In his annual letter to shareholders, published on Friday, Mr. Buffett said that he wanted to “spice things up” by finding a money manager with an unfavorable view of Berkshire Hathaway to participate in the company’s annual meeting.
docs.abstract: Warren E Buffett invites Doug Kass, hedge fund manager who has shorted Berkshire Hathaway stock and thus bet that its price will fall, to the panel of analysts at the company's yearly gathering. Photo (M)

headline.main: Buffett Picks His Bear for His Annual Meeting

docs.snippet: Brian Cashman sustained his first injury from one of his adventurous extracurricular activities when he broke his right fibula jumping out of a plane for charity....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brian Cashman sustained his first injury from one of his adventurous extracurricular activities when he broke his right fibula jumping out of a plane for charity.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees general manager Brian Cashman, known for his adventurous extracurricular activities, breaks his fibula while sky diving for charity.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Cashman Breaks Leg After Jumping Out of Plane
headline.main: For Daring Yankees G.M., Sky Diving Proves Undoing
headline.print_headline: For Daring Yankees G.M., Sky Diving Proves Undoing
